Uses of Class
org.apache.flink.api.java.operators.AggregateOperator

  • Packages that use AggregateOperator 
    Package Description
    org.apache.flink.api.java  
    org.apache.flink.api.java.operators  

    • Uses of AggregateOperator in org.apache.flink.api.java

      Methods in org.apache.flink.api.java that return AggregateOperator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AggregateOperator<T> DataSet.aggregate(Aggregations agg, int field)
      Applies an Aggregate transformation on a non-grouped Tuple DataSet.
      Note: Only Tuple DataSets can be aggregated. The transformation applies a built-in Aggregation on a specified field of a Tuple DataSet.
      AggregateOperator<T> DataSet.max(int field)
      Syntactic sugar for aggregate (MAX, field)
      AggregateOperator<T> DataSet.min(int field)
      Syntactic sugar for aggregate (MIN, field)
      AggregateOperator<T> DataSet.sum(int field)
      Syntactic sugar for aggregate (SUM, field)

    • Uses of AggregateOperator in org.apache.flink.api.java.operators

      Methods in org.apache.flink.api.java.operators that return AggregateOperator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AggregateOperator<T> UnsortedGrouping.aggregate(Aggregations agg, int field)
      Applies an Aggregate transformation on a grouped Tuple DataSet.
      Note: Only Tuple DataSets can be aggregated. The transformation applies a built-in Aggregation on a specified field of a Tuple group.
      AggregateOperator<IN> AggregateOperator.and(Aggregations function, int field) 
      AggregateOperator<IN> AggregateOperator.andMax(int field) 
      AggregateOperator<IN> AggregateOperator.andMin(int field) 
      AggregateOperator<IN> AggregateOperator.andSum(int field) 
      AggregateOperator<T> UnsortedGrouping.max(int field)
      Syntactic sugar for aggregate (MAX, field)
      AggregateOperator<T> UnsortedGrouping.min(int field)
      Syntactic sugar for aggregate (MIN, field)
      AggregateOperator<T> UnsortedGrouping.sum(int field)
      Syntactic sugar for aggregate (SUM, field)
